posts.text:
- Screen Size: 22.0" wide
- Color: Silver-Black
- Resolution: 1680 x 1050 (WSXGA+)
- Pixel Pitch: 0.282 mm
- Brightness: 300 cd/m2
- Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
- Response Time: 5ms
- Display Area: 473.76 x 296.16 (mm)
- Display Colours: 16.7 million
- Viewing Angle: 160/160 (CR>=10)
- Input Signals: D-Sub/DVI-D
- Horizontal Frequency: (KHz) 30 - 82 KHz
- Vertical Frequency: (Hz) 56 - 76 (for 1680x1050, max 60Hz)
- Video Bandwidth: (MHZ) 25 - 165 MHz
- Colour Temperature Settings: Cool/Warm
- Power Consumption: 48W (max)
- Power Supply: Built-in
- Speakers: 1Wx2
-
- Features:
- Vesa Wall Mounting (100 x 100 mm)
- i-Key
- Kensington Lock
-
- Adjustments: (down/up) Tilt (forward/backward) -2 / +23 degrees
- Dimensions: (WxHxD) 423.6 x 509 x 202.4mm
- Weight: 4.9 kg
